name: Jumper (Alienplay)
description:
Jumper is an addictive arcade game. Jumper is easy to learn, but hard to master. This jumping game has simple controls, and minimalistic look.

  •  Jump from platform to platform to get points
  • Simple and interesting gameplay
  • Several different types of platforms
  • Trail color changes for every 5 points you get

Platforms:
 1) Platform which just stands still
 2) Platform which breaks  down after couple of seconds
 3) Platform which moves up and down

Controls: Just swipe in the direction in which you want to jump.
